channel.title: Overview on OpenAQ Design System
channel.description: Recent content in Overview on OpenAQ Design System

item.title: Color
item.description: Primary color palette The full color palette provides a wide range of colors. Three colors should be used at the primary colors which are aliases for colors within the color palette: Brand Base data Base interactive Status OK Status Alert Status Warning "Brand"/sky-100 - Brand is the primary color, matching the OpenAQ logo color "Base data"/lavender-100 - Base data is the primary color for data, charts, etc "Base interactive"/ocean-100 - Base interactive can be used as a secondary color for data, charts etc and as a interactive color "

item.title: Typography
item.description: Space Grotesk is the primary font face used in the OpenAQ design system. Text color should default to smoke-120 when on a white background, but other colors can be used in different circumstances with appropriate semantic meaning and visible contrast. https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Space+Grotesk Display 1 Heading 1 Heading 2 Heading 3 Subtitle 1 Subtitle 2 Subtitle 3 Body 1 Body 2 Body 3 Body 4 Body 5 Link 1 Link 2 Link 3 Link 4 Link 5

item.title: Icons
item.description: OpenAQ uses Material Symbols as the baseline icon set. When the lilbrary does not cover a specific requirement, it is permissible to create custom icons in line with the same style. menu menu remove remove add add expand_less expand_less expand_more expand_more check check close close arrow_forward arrow_forward skip_next skip_next cloud_download cloud_download sim_card_download sim_card_download star star star_border star_border <span class="material-symbols-outlined"> menu </span> <span class="material-symbols-outlined"> remove </span> <span class="material-symbols-outlined"> add </span> <span class="material-symbols-outlined"> expand_less </span> <span class="material-symbols-outlined"> expand_more </span> <span class="material-symbols-outlined"> check </span> <span class="material-symbols-outlined"> close </span> <span class="material-symbols-outlined"> arrow_forward </span> <span class="material-icons">skip_next </span> <span class="material-icons"> cloud_download </span> <span class="material-icons"> sim_card_download </span> <span class="material-icons"> star </span> <span class="material-icons"> star_border </span>
